Nationai. Association -6r Educational Broadcasters
1340 CONNECTICUT AVENUE WASHINGTON, 13. C. 20030
June 10, 1964
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Administrative Vice President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Dupont Circle Office Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Harold;
Enclosed is a breakdown on the Budget for the project. This is in the same form
as the one you prepared, but it has been brought up to date as of May 31, 1964.
This represents the amounts as shown in our books. Would you please check your
books to see if the amounts agree. There will probably be differences in the
Staff and Committee Travel; If so, could we get a copy of your ledger page or
a listing of the amounts under each.
Sincerely,
Project Director
CRT/mw
Enclosure
cc: Mr. James Fellows
Please reply to:
Dr. Clair R. Tettemer
General Manager
KFME-TV/Channel 13
Highway 81 South
Fargo, North Dakota 58101
